text: Hi Jayendra. As far as I recall you cannot use <http://preview.hs-sites.com|preview.hs-sites.com> as the preview link.
Hey Jayendra, you should be able to swap out the `preview` portion of your URL with the portal ID in which the template is in. For example: `<http://12345.hs-sites.com|12345.hs-sites.com>`
Hey <@U2H3TT8F2> to clarify is it possible to use the <http://hs-sites.com|hs-sites.com> as previews for the theme competition?

Yep, the rules for marketplace submission apply to that as well. You can use `[portalID].<http://hs-sites.com|hs-sites.com>` for it. The only URL that would not be allowed is the `<http://preview.hs-sites.com|preview.hs-sites.com>` url
